item.title: David add a quote by Narcotics Anonymous
item.description: "Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results." -- Narcotics Anonymous

item.title: David add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "That which does not kill us makes us stronger." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: David add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Be not afraid of greatness. Some are born great, some achieve greatness, and others have greatness thrust upon them." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: David add a quote by H. Jackson Brown Jr.
item.description: "Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do. So throw off the bowlines. Sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover." -- H. Jackson Brown Jr.

item.title: David add a quote by Bessie Anderson Stanley
David add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "I have never let my schooling interfere with my education." -- Mark Twain

item.title: David add a quote by Arthur Schopenhauer
item.description: "Talent hits a target no one else can hit. Genius hits a target no one else can see." -- Arthur Schopenhauer

item.title: David add a quote by Aristotle
item.description: "Knowing yourself is the beginning of all wisdom." -- Aristotle

item.title: David add a quote by Gerald R. Ford
item.description: "A government big enough to give you everything you want is a government big enough to take from you everything you have." -- Gerald R. Ford

item.title: David add a quote by Thomas Jefferson
item.description: "A library book lasts as long as a house, for hundreds of years. It is not an article for mere consumption, but fairly of capital, and often in the case of professional men, setting out in life, it is their only capital." -- Thomas Jefferson

item.title: David add a quote by Napoleon Hill
item.description: "Cherish your vision and your dreams as they are the children of your soul, the blueprints of your ultimate achievements." -- Napoleon Hill

item.title: David add a quote by Napoleon Hill
item.description: "Hold a picture of yourself long and steadily enough in your mind's eye, and you will be drawn toward it." -- Napoleon Hill

item.title: David add a quote by Napoleon Hill
item.description: "If you can't do great things, do small things in a great way." -- Napoleon Hill

item.title: David add a quote by Henry David Thoreau
item.description: "Never look back unless you are planning to go that way." -- Henry David Thoreau

item.title: David add a quote by Henry David Thoreau
item.description: "I learned this, at least, by my experiment: that if one advances confidently in the direction of his dreams, and endeavors to live the life which he has imagined, he will meet with a success unexpected in common hours." -- Henry David Thoreau

item.title: David add a quote by Walt Disney
item.description: "All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them." -- Walt Disney

item.title: David add a quote by George Carlin
item.description: "Some people see things that are and ask, Why? Some people dream of things that never were and ask, Why not? Some people have to go to work and don't have time for all that." -- George Carlin

item.title: David add a quote by Vincent Van Gogh
item.description: "I don't know anything with certainty, but seeing the stars makes me dream." -- Vincent Van Gogh

item.title: David add a quote by Harriet Tubman
item.description: "Every great dream begins with a dreamer. Always remember, you have within you the strength, the patience, and the passion to reach for the stars to change the world." -- Harriet Tubman

item.title: David add a quote by Thomas Jefferson
item.description: "On matters of style, swim with the current, on matters of principle, stand like a rock." -- Thomas Jefferson

item.title: David add a quote by Thomas Jefferson
item.description: "I predict future happiness for Americans, if they can prevent the government from wasting the labors of the people under the pretense of taking care of them." -- Thomas Jefferson

item.title: David add a quote by Aaron Burr
item.description: "Never put off for tomorrow, what you can do today." -- Aaron Burr

item.title: David add a quote by Andrew Jackson
item.description: "Desperate courage makes One a majority." -- Andrew Jackson

item.title: David add a quote by Thomas Jefferson
item.description: "I like the dreams of the future better than the history of the past." -- Thomas Jefferson

item.title: David add a quote by Charles Darwin
item.description: "A man who dares to waste one hour of time has not discovered the value of life." -- Charles Darwin

item.title: David add a quote by Leon C. Megginson
item.description: "It is not the strongest of the species that survives, nor the most intelligent, but the one most responsive to change." -- Leon C. Megginson

item.title: David add a quote by Henry David Thoreau
item.description: "If you have built castles in the air, your work need not be lost; that is where they should be. Now put the foundations under them." -- Henry David Thoreau

item.title: David add a quote by Henry David Thoreau
item.description:
"It is not enough to be industrious; so are the ants. What are you industrious about?"
[<i>Letter to Harrison Blake</i>; November 16, 1857]" -- Henry David Thoreau

item.title: David add a quote by Albert Pike
item.description: "What we have done for ourselves alone dies with us; what we have done for others and the world remains and is immortal." -- Albert Pike
